channel.title: Bastard Unoriginal Unfun April Fools' Turbo [Marshal, Derps, sulit, and Ami win!]
channel.description:
Hosted by Arete
Rules: 1. Follow all the normal rules 2. Days are 10 minutes. Nights are 4 minutes. 3. Lynches are majority + plurality. Ties rand. 3. This game is *explicitly bastard*. Your role PM and the OP may leave out important and relevant information. However, neither the OP nor your role card will explicitly lie to you, and your win condition will always be truthful. 4. Although this is bastard, it is still a game. For instance, you can't screenshot your role PM and post it in the thread because 'lolbastard.' 4. This is literally an April Fools' turbo. Treat it with that amount of seriousness.
This game will start at [date=2020-04-01 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"] provided that at least 5 people have joined.
Sign-ups: 1. Wazza 2. Amelia 3. Ami 4. Marshal 5. Simon 6. SamiDerpsALot 7. katze 8. eevee 9. Italy 10. sulit
